医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究旨在确定干预措施，以消除与肺癌和吸烟相关的呼吸道疾病相关的耻辱感根据今天在国际肺癌研究协会上发表的研究，肺癌患者在被诊断出肺癌时面临的耻辱与较差的社会心理结果有关，包括痛苦和孤立、延迟寻求帮助以及对护理质量的担忧(IASLC) 2023 年世界肺癌大会在新加坡举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Study-aims-to-identify-interventions-to-combat-stigma-linked-with-lung-cancer-and-smoking-lated-respiratory-diseases。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Study-aims-to-identify-interventions-to-combat-stigma-linked-with-lung-cancer-and-smoking-lated-respiratory-diseases。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59f6adb9-4cef-46a7-a4d4-85daef477403 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 09:43:13 -0400 Study aims to identify interventions to combat stigma associated with lung cancer and smoking-related respiratory diseases
Adagrasib 在 KRAS-G12C 突变 NSCLC 中显示出持久的临床活性口服选择性 KRAS G12C 抑制剂 口服选择性 KRAS G12C 抑制剂 KRAS-G12C 抑制剂阿达格拉西 (adagrasib) 表现出持久的临床活性，中位总生存期为 14.1 个月，大约三分之一的患者在两年后仍存活。国际肺癌研究协会 (IASLC) 2023 年世界肺癌大会在新加坡举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Adagrasib-shows-durable-clinical-activity-in-KRAS-G12C-mutated-NSCLC.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Adagrasib-shows-durable-clinical-activity-in-KRAS-G12C-mutated-NSCLC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff9b5a2a-efb5-420a-91ab-4bfa2878ca0d Mon, 11 Sep 2023 09:36:59 -0400 Adagrasib shows durable clinical activity in KRAS-G12C-mutated NSCLC
研究为 III 期 EGFR 突变非小细胞肺癌患者带来新希望免疫治疗药物 durvalumab 已成为 III 期非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC) 患者在化疗和放疗后服用时提高生存率的标准治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Study-provides-new-hope-for-病人-with-stage-III-EGFR-mutant-non-small-cell-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Study-provides-new-hope-for-病人-with-stage-III-EGFR-mutant-non-small-cell-lung-cancer.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62dee080-b674-4343-aaf8-223bf5fa6aa8 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 09:30:05 -0400 Study provides new hope for patients with stage III EGFR-mutant non-small cell lung cancer
无创呼吸分析可以改善恶性胸膜间皮瘤的治疗今天在新加坡举行的国际肺癌研究协会 (IASLC) 2023 年世界肺癌大会上发表的研究表明，识别和分析恶性胸膜间皮瘤患者呼出气体中的挥发性有机化合物有望成为 MPM 的筛查方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Non-guarantee-breath-analysis-could-improve-treatment-of-malignant-pleural-mesothelioma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Non-guarantee-breath-analysis-could-improve-treatment-of-malignant-pleural-mesothelioma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a4c436a-7baa-410b-a2e7-2820a1ded2f7 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 09:24:02 -0400 Non-invasive breath analysis could improve treatment of malignant pleural mesothelioma
Musashi-2 蛋白在骨骼肌质量和代谢过程的调节中发挥关键作用东京都立大学的研究人员表明，蛋白质 Musashi-2 (Msi2) 在骨骼肌质量和代谢过程的调节中发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Musashi-2- Protein-plays-key-role-in-the-regulation-of-mass-and-metabolic-processes-in-skeletal-muscle。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Musashi-2- Protein-plays-key-role-in-the-regulation-of-mass-and-metabolic-processes-in-skeletal-muscle。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd5d68a6-26c4-46fd-a57d-3c066f739a59 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 09:21:47 -0400 Musashi-2 protein plays key role in the regulation of mass and metabolic processes in skeletal muscle
探索黑茶的抗癌潜力黑茶在癌症预防和管理方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Exploring-the-anti-cancer-pottial-of-dark-tea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Exploring-the-anti-cancer-pottial-of-dark-tea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f275bbe-b093-4d1a-ac8a-ae9631896d78 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 08:29:00 -0400 Exploring the anti-cancer potential of dark tea
COVID-19 大流行限制如何影响侵袭性脑膜炎球菌疾病趋势？ COVID-19 大流行限制对脑膜炎球菌的发病率和菌株分布的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/How-did-COVID-19-pandemic-restrictions-impact-guarantee-meningococcal-disease-trends.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/How-did-COVID-19-pandemic-restrictions-impact-guarantee-meningococcal-disease-trends.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60a65bf3-9ad2-454d-b7e7-34d2b29d7405 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 08:12:00 -0400 How did COVID-19 pandemic restrictions impact invasive meningococcal disease trends?
支气管扩张患者痰液颜色可提示肺部炎症程度根据在意大利米兰举行的欧洲呼吸学会国际大会上发表的新研究，肺部疾病支气管扩张症患者的痰液颜色可以表明肺部炎症程度并预测其未来的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Color-of-the-phlegm-can-indicate- Degree-of-lung-inflammation-in-病人-with-bronchiectasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Color-of-the-phlegm-can-indicate- Degree-of-lung-inflammation-in-病人-with-bronchiectasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10d40a84-fafd-4830-97fe-1ea709cdb3bd Mon, 11 Sep 2023 08:07:43 -0400 Color of the phlegm can indicate degree of lung inflammation in patients with bronchiectasis
有针对性的饮食和运动干预可以改善乳腺癌患者的化疗结果耶鲁大学癌症中心的一项新研究发现，有针对性的饮食和运动干预可以改善接受乳腺癌化疗的女性的预后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Targeted-diet-and-exercise-intervention-could-improve-chemotherapy-outcomes-for-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Targeted-diet-and-exercise-intervention-could-improve-chemotherapy-outcomes-for-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63cea44e-3024-454d-8116-15cc4bf07898 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 08:03:22 -0400 Targeted diet and exercise intervention could improve chemotherapy outcomes for breast cancer patients
生殖激素水平波动会导致心理健康问题吗？心理健康与生殖激素水平波动之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Can-fluctuating-reproductive-hormone-levels-cause-mental-health-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Can-fluctuating-reproductive-hormone-levels-cause-mental-health-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13db9816-4a91-4297-9b3e-6bd0af94cb0c Mon, 11 Sep 2023 08:03:00 -0400 Can fluctuating reproductive hormone levels cause mental health conditions?
